price: We waremye ibirere n’isi ndetse n’ibiri hagati yabyo mu minsi itandatu, hanyuma Nyirimpuhwe (Allah) aganza hejuru ya Ar’shi.[1] Bityo (yewe Muhamadi) mubaze ibijyanye na We (akwibwire kuko) ariyizi neza.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ فَسۡـَٔلۡ بِهِۦ خَبِيرٗا
footnotes: [1] Reba uko twasobanuye iri jambo muri Surat al A’araf: 54.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā fī sittati ayyāmin thumma is'tawā ʿalā al-ʿarshi al-raḥmānu fasal bihi khabīran
